content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment today. May I have your name to get started?
It's Linda. I need someone to check my air conditioning ASAP, it's not working.
Thank you, Linda. I understand it's urgent. Can you please provide your address so I can confirm we service your area?
Great, thank you! We do service Fairview. When would be the best time for a technician to come out? Do you have a preferred time or date?
As soon as possible please. Today if you can.
Thank you, Linda. I will check our calendar for the soonest available appointment.
I'm sorry, Linda, but I'm having trouble accessing the appointment calendar right now. Would you like me to connect you with a team member who can help you right away?
reason: Calendar system error, human needed to assist
